Grace Hospitality Group

Trek With Us!!!

Services at Grace

Hotel Grace Lowcamp

We provide you with the best quality Nepali cuisines and the coziest accommodation for your Mardi Himal trek. Your satisfaction is our utmost priority.

Shiding Namuna Agro Farm

To provide you with best quality organic food we have our own farm. We make an effort to send only the best food to your table.

Grace Adventures Tours and Travels

To make your trek more comfortable, we provide the best route. Grace adventures tours and travels ensures you will have safe and fulfilling trek.

Grace Hospitality Group is committed towards guests' exclusive experience to discover nature closely with distinctive care and courtesy. We promote local organic products and help to thrive internal tourism.

About Us

Situated in lap of Mardi Himal, we aim to provide travellers a safe, beautiful and enjoyable experience of Mardi Himal Trek. We have both high and low camps for accomodation, our own agro farm for best organic food and travel agency for great travel experience.

We are also known as Grace Lowcamp/ Mardi Himal Lowcamp.
